description: Enterprise reporting table that contains the editing history of learning assessment contacts. It identifies the user who edited the assessment.

columns.name: LEARNING_ASSMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient learning assessment record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Counter for the edit instance and editing user of the patient learning assessment record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in external format.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Record ID for the user who edited the patient learning assessment record contact. It is related to the Edit Instance and is stored in internal ID format. Points to EMP user record.

columns.name: EDIT_INSTANCE
columns.description: Date/Time stamp for instance of editing the patient learning assessment record contact. It is related to the Edit User.

columns.name: END_CONT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of the last encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: EDIT_IS_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the learning assessment was deleted in this line in the learning assessment's edit history. Y indicates that the learning assessment was deleted; N or a null value indicates that the learning assessment was not deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EDIT_DEL_COMMENT
columns.description: The comments entered by the user who deleted the learning assessment.
